entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
